author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Go to https://brilliant.org/nutshell/ to dive deeper into these topics and more with a free 30-day trial + 20% off the premium subscription! 
This video was sponsored by Brilliant. Thanks a lot for the support!

Turn your walls into a science masterpiece! Explore our expertly designed posters and directly fund our videos – only in the kurzgesagt shop: https://shop.kgs.link/science

Sources & further reading:
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-mutant-flies/

A war has been raging for decades in the jungles of Panama, as we fight one of the most terrifying parasites on Earth. It is so relentless that our best defense is to drop 100 million radiation-blasted, flesh-eating flies from the sky – every week.
It’s one of the most successful biological campaigns in history, but it’s a war we can never stop fighting… and one we can’t afford to lose.

title: Why Is The US Dropping Billions Of Mutant Flies From The Sky?
